price: (Ворисларки,) Фирдавсни мерос қилиб оладилар ва у ерда абадий қоладилар.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yarithūna al-fir'dawsa hum fīhā khālidūna
